channel.title: Auxy is featured in App Store story 🇯🇵
channel.description:
![image|281x500](upload://is8GQZy6TiqxLM8qGEkS7YHH1Ek.png) ![image|281x500](upload://ogoGQci8jxBpFDxW9sBhS6fPGR0.png)
I’m not sure if it appears in other countries but here’s a brief summary of the article.
- An artist named Lisachris tried making music with Auxy - In the article, processes of consisting drums, melodies are described with videos. - She named the song “Sad Lemming” (which sounds like she just used the default name for me) - this is a second part of the two stories, and first part mentioned how she make music video with iPhone App called Triller.
I hope this article helps to induce more Japanese users✨
Need more info?

item.title: Auxy is featured in App Store story 🇯🇵
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
JPNYC:

I wish there was a blog that showed the behind the scenes work that goes into the app. Articles on best mobile music creation practices, tips and tricks, interviews with other artists and their process, sneek peeks on updates and new sounds.

There are a few really good mobile music focussed YouTube channels.
The Audiobus forum is a great resource as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy is featured in App Store story 🇯🇵

item.title: Auxy is featured in App Store story 🇯🇵
item.dc:creator: JPNYC
item.description:
I really wish that Auxy got more ‘air time’. I wish there was more recent reviews by top music magazines, musicians, blogs etc. I feel that Auxy the brand is really missing out on a greater audience, because of the lack of social media engagement and greater community interaction.

The users do a great job here in this community with supporting each other and sharing etc, but I wish the outside world at large could see what Auxy is capable of.

I wish there was a blog that showed the behind the scenes work that goes into the app. Articles on best mobile music creation practices, tips and tricks, interviews with other artists and their process, sneek peeks on updates and new sounds.

A short documentary on an artist who creates music scores while riding the subway in NYC every day. Stories about how Auxy is being integrated into an artists bigger workflow. Featured artist of the month. Limited addition merch. Stickers ‘made with Auxy’.

If you need help with any of this, let me know.

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy is featured in App Store story 🇯🇵
